titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to modify the computation for part-time service under the Civil Service Retirement System.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce, and the District of Columbia.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 341.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

committee.subcommittee: Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce, and the District of Columbia
committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 4/12/2010--Reported to Senate without amendment. Requires part-time service performed by a federal employee before April 7, 1986, to be credited as full-time service for purposes of annuity computation under the Civil Service Retirement System (currently, the annuity benefit for such part-time service is prorated).
